mapper.select: SELECT m.prt_nm, u.user_nm, c.cust_no, c.cust_nm, c.mbl_no, c.cust_ss_cd, c.js_dt, c.jn_prt_cd, c.fst_user_id, c.lst_upd_dt, c.lst_upd_id FROM cs_cust01_mt c JOIN ma_prt_mt m ON c.jn_prt_cd = m.prt_cd JOIN ma_user_mt u ON c.fst_user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY c.cust_no

SELECT * FROM CS_CUST01_MT WHERE
cust_nm LIKE '%' || #{cust_nm} || '%'
mbl_no LIKE '%' || #{mbl_no} || '%'
mbl_no LIKE '%' || #{mbl_no} || '%' and cust_nm LIKE '%' || #{cust_nm} || '%'

SELECT h.cust_no ,(substr(h.chg_dt,1,4) || '-' || substr(h.chg_dt,5,2) || '-' || substr(h.chg_dt,7,2)) AS chg_dt ,h.chg_bf_cnt ,h.chg_aft_cnt ,h.lst_upd_dt ,h.lst_upd_id ,u.user_nm ,(CASE WHEN upper(h.chg_cd) = 'CUST_NO' THEN '고객번호' WHEN upper(h.chg_cd)= 'CUST_NM' THEN '고객명' WHEN upper(h.chg_cd) = 'SEX_CD' THEN '성별코드' WHEN upper(h.chg_cd) = 'BRDY_DT' THEN '생년월일' WHEN upper(h.chg_cd) = 'POC_CD' THEN '직업코드' WHEN upper(h.chg_cd) = 'MBL_NO' THEN '휴대폰번호' WHEN upper(h.chg_cd) = 'CUST_SS_CD' THEN '고객상태코드' WHEN upper(h.chg_cd) = 'JN_PRT_CD' THEN '가입매장' WHEN upper(h.chg_cd) = 'STP_DT' THEN '중지일자' WHEN upper(h.chg_cd) = 'CNCL_DT' THEN '해지일자' END) AS chg_cd FROM SD_CUST01_HT h JOIN ma_user_mt u ON h.lst_upd_id=u.user_id WHERE h.CUST_NO=#{cust_no} ORDER BY h.CHG_DT DESC

SELECT m.prt_nm, u.user_nm, c.cust_no, c.cust_nm, c.mbl_no, c.cust_ss_cd, (substr(c.js_dt,1,4) || '-' || substr(c.js_dt,5,2) || '-' || substr(c.js_dt,7,2)) AS js_dt, c.jn_prt_cd, c.fst_user_id, c.lst_upd_dt, c.lst_upd_id FROM cs_cust01_mt c JOIN ma_prt_mt m ON c.jn_prt_cd = m.prt_cd JOIN ma_user_mt u ON c.jn_prt_cd = u.prt_cd WHERE
m.prt_cd=#{prt_cd} AND m.prt_nm=#{prt_nm} and
c.cust_no=#{cust_no} AND c.cust_nm=#{cust_nm} and
m.prt_cd=#{prt_cd} AND m.prt_nm=#{prt_nm} and c.cust_no=#{cust_no} AND c.cust_nm=#{cust_nm} and
c.cust_ss_cd LIKE '%'|| '0' ||'%' AND
c.cust_ss_cd = #{cust_ss_cd} AND
c.cust_ss_cd = #{cust_ss_cd} AND
c.cust_ss_cd = #{cust_ss_cd} AND
(c.js_dt BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate})
